subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Ivan Ljubicic was 2 points from losing the match when he rallied to beat Steve Darcis, 6-7 (6), 7-5, 7-6 (4), in a rare Sunday start for the clay-court Masters event in Hamburg, Germany.
snippet: Ivan Ljubicic was 2 points from losing the match when he rallied to beat Steve Darcis, 6-7 (6), 7-5, 7-6 (4), in a rare Sunday start for the clay-court Masters event in Hamburg, Germany.
